item.title: New Job Offer @ Senior Applied Scientist
item.description: Announcement! iFetch has a new opening! If you’re someone eager to learn more, to contribute to the evolution of systems based on theoretical explanation and able to applying their knowledge and implementing solutions at scale, this job is for you.
